snippet: At a Rock the Vote event at a Des Moines high school, Ron Paul was the crowd pleaser.
abstract: At a Rock the Vote event at a Des Moines high school, Ron Paul was the crowd pleaser.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- When I was in high school, assemblies rarely deviated from the following pattern: No matter the speaker, the students would start out restless, and leave bored. But we never had Ron Paul as a closer.

headline.main: Words of Wisdom From the Candidates: End This, Repeal That
